samples.context: Contraception to avoid pregnancy can be achieved by the use of condoms, oral pills, copper -T and other methods. Each of these methods has its own effectiveness and suitability for different individuals.
samples.question: What are some contraceptive methods?

samples.context: Contraception to avoid pregnancy can be achieved by the use of condoms, oral pills, copper -T and other methods. Understanding these methods can help individuals make informed choices about family planning.
samples.question: Why is it important to understand contraceptive methods?

samples.context: Contraception to avoid pregnancy can be achieved by the use of condoms, oral pills, copper -T and other methods. The effectiveness of these methods varies and can be influenced by user compliance and correct application.
samples.question: How can effectiveness of contraception vary?
